entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
